text: Friendly Mart is a small convenience store which is located at Geylang vicinity. It provides groceries as well daily needs. It is located within walking distance from some budget hotels at Geylang so tourists may get their necessities here as well.

Very rude and racist man in the cashier. This is the FriendlyMart which is opposite Ibis Budget Singapore Sapphire I am talking about. They are not friendly at all. Would never go and not recommend to any other person

We almost got scammed by the counter with wearing glasses woman. She though we are from China as a tourist. It put multiple and differences products with a high cost. Also she was freaking weird, I suggest to all hotel and hostel be aware for this store. I will put on other platform too
I used to buy some local food products such as squid crackles or oreo biscuits.  I also used to buy redbull and Camel Filter Long Cigarettes or Wilson Cigarettes packet
Cheapest beers we got in Singapore. Super nice and weâ€™re open later than regular times
